blogPost.title: Blog Post
blogPost.description: Represents a single blog post entry.

title.description: The title of the blog post.

description.description: A short meta description for the blog post.

slug.description: The URL-friendly slug for the blog post.

tags.description: Relevant tags for the blog post.

content.description: The full content of the blog post, formatted as HTML.

image.description: URL for a relevant hero image for the blog post.

imageHint.description: Two-word hint for the image content, e.g., 'technology abstract'.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the blog post was created, used for sorting.

contactMessage.title: Contact Message
contactMessage.description: Represents a message submitted through the contact form.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was submitted.

usedImageHint.title: Used Image Hint
usedImageHint.description: Stores a record of an image hint that has been successfully used.

hint.description: The keyword hint used for an image search.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the hint was used.

/contactMessages/{messageId}.description: Stores messages submitted through the contact form.

/usedImageHints/{hintId}.description: Stores keywords that have been used for hero images to avoid duplication.
